text.content: He was spending the evening with his younger brother Andrés and his friends.
Camilo dressed as a vampire, while the kids wore ghost costumes.
They decided to make pumpkin pie.
The smell of cinnamon and spice filled the kitchen.
Then, they lit candles and told ghost stories.
"It’s too dangerous in our neighborhood," Camilo said.
At his aunt’s house, they rang the bell.
She laughed and gave them candy.
On the way home, a group of grown-ups handed them gummy bars.
Back home, they sat and ate their treats.
It was the best Halloween ever.
